# Government Tender Announcement: Integrated Waste Management at St-Jean and Farnham Garrisons (Quebec)

**Tender Reference:** MX-43080634389
**Amendment Number:** 3
**Publication Date:** April 2, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** May 14, 2024, 14:00:00

**Project Overview:**

Defence Construction Canada (DCC) invites qualified vendors to submit bids for the Integrated Waste Management project at St-Jean and Farnham Garrisons (Quebec). The project involves the supply of labor, materials, supervision, and equipment necessary to manage residual materials, including collection, transportation, recovery, reclamation, and disposal.

**Scope of Work:**

The scope of work includes:

* Collection, transportation, recovery, reclamation, and disposal of residual materials
* Rental of wheeled bins, containers, and compactors

**Site Visit:**

A non-mandatory site visit has been scheduled for May 3, 2024, 9:00 a.m., at the St-Jean Garrison (QC). Interested bidders are required to register by May 2, 2024, at 12:00 p.m. with Patrick Gbedo at Patrick.Gbedo@dcc-cdc.gc.ca.

**Estimated Contract Value:**

The estimated contract value is in the order of $540,000 for a two-year period, with the possibility of three additional one-year extensions.

**Trade Agreements:**

This solicitation is being conducted in accordance with the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Contact Information:**

For any questions or clarification regarding this solicitation, please contact Patrick Gbedo at Patrick.Gbedo@dcc-cdc.gc.ca.

**Tender Documents:**

Tender documents and bidding information are available on http://www.merx.com. Fees may apply; see https://www.merx.com/public/pricing for more information.

**Contract Award:**

Tenderers can obtain contract award results from the DCC website at https://www.dcc-cdc.gc.ca/industry/contract-activity. Please note that the preliminary tender results will be available on MERX.
